Strings


package sample01;
import java.util.*;

public class String01 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Scanner S=new Scanner(System.in);
		String str=S.nextLine();
		System.out.println(str);
		System.out.println(str.length());
		System.out.println(str.toUpperCase());
		System.out.println(str.toLowerCase());
		System.out.println(str.charAt(0));
		System.out.println(str.indexOf('l'));
		System.out.println(str.lastIndexOf('h'));
		System.out.println(str.replace("h","e"));
		System.out.println(str);
		String s1="hello";
		String s2="HEllo";
		System.out.println(s1.equals(s2));
		System.out.println(s1.equalsIgnoreCase(s2));
		String s3="       hello      ";
		System.out.println(s3);
		System.out.println(s3.trim());
		String s4="1,2,3,4,5";
		System.out.println(Arrays.toString(s4.split(" ")));

	}

}


output:

hello bha
hello bha
9
HELLO BHA
hello bha
h
2
7
eello bea
hello bha
false
true
       hello      
hello
[1,2,3,4,5]


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

package sample01;
import java.util.*;

public class String01 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		StringBuilder str = new StringBuilder("hello");
		System.out.println(str);
	    System.out.println(str.append(" bhai"));
	    System.out.println(str);
	    str.insert(5, " hii");
	    System.out.println(str);
	    str.reverse();
	    System.out.println(str);
		
		
	}

}

output:

hello
hello bhai
hello bhai
hello hii bhai
iahb iih olleh

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

package sample01;
import java.util.*;

public class String01 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		
		
		Scanner S=new Scanner(System.in); 
		String s=S.nextLine();
		int l=s.length();
		
		String res="";
		for(int i=0;i<l;i++)
		{   char ch=s.charAt(i);
		
			if(ch=='a'||ch=='e'||ch=='i'||ch=='o'||ch=='u')
			{
				res+=ch;
			}
		}
		System.out.println("the no.of vowels are "+res);
		
	}

}


output:


hello bhai
the no.of vowels are eoai

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


package sample01;
import java.util.*;

public class String01 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		
		
		Scanner S=new Scanner(System.in); 
		
		String str=S.nextLine();
		int l=str.length();
		int c1=0;
		int c2=0;
		int c3=0;
		for(int i=0;i<l;i++)
		{
			char ch=str.charAt(i);
			if(Character.isUpperCase(ch))
			{
				c1++;
				
			}
			else if(Character.isLowerCase(ch))
			{
				c2++;
			}
			else
			{
				c3++;
			}
		}
		System.out.println("uppercase "+c1);
        System.out.println("lowercase "+c2);
        System.out.println("special characters are "+c3);
		}

}

output:

HIIbeoooo327313173**
uppercase 3
lowercase 6
special characters are 11

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------



package sample01;
import java.util.*;

public class String01 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		
		Scanner S=new Scanner(System.in); 
		
        
        String str=S.nextLine();
        StringBuilder b=new StringBuilder();
        int l=str.length();
        for(int i=0;i<l;i++)
        {
        	char ch=str.charAt(i);
        	if(ch>='a'&& ch<='z')
        	{
        	
        		int pos=ch - 'a'+ 1;
        		
        	
        	if(i!=(l-1))
        			{
        		      b.append(pos).append(",");
        			}
        	else
        	{
        		b.append(pos);
        	}
            }
        }
        System.out.println(b);
	}

}

output:

abc
1,2,3

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


package sample01;
import java.util.*;

public class String01 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		
		Scanner S=new Scanner(System.in); 
		
	String str=S.nextLine();
	int l=str.length();
	int c1=0;
	int c2=0;
	int c3=0;
	for(int i=0;i<l;i++)
	{
		char ch=str.charAt(i);
		if(Character.isUpperCase(ch))
		{
			c1++;
		}
		else if(Character.isLowerCase(ch))
		{
			c2++;
		}
		else
		{
			c3++;
		}
		
	}
	if(c1>0 && c2>0 && c3>0 && l>=8)
	{
		System.out.println("valid");
	}
	else
	{
		System.out.println("Invalid");
	}
	
	
	
	}

}

output:

Hiilow9@
valid

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


package sample01;
import java.util.*;

public class String02 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Scanner s=new Scanner(System.in);
		/*int n=s.nextInt();
		int sum=0;
		int arr[]=new int[n];
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			arr[i]=s.nextInt();
		}
		System.out.println(Arrays.toString(arr));
		for(int i=0;i<n-1;i++)
		{
			for(int j=i+1;j<n;j++)
			{
				if(arr[j]>arr[i])
				{
					sum=sum+arr[j];
					break;
				}
			}
		}
		System.out.println(sum);*/

		String str=s.nextLine();
		
		for(int i=0;i<str.length();i++)
		{
			char ch=str.charAt(i);
			if(ch>=97 && ch<=122)
			{
				ch-=3;
			}
			System.out.print(ch);
		}
		
		

	}

}


output:

khoor
hello


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


package sample01;
import java.util.*;

public class String02 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Scanner s=new Scanner(System.in);
		/*int n=s.nextInt();
		int sum=0;
		int arr[]=new int[n];
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			arr[i]=s.nextInt();
		}
		System.out.println(Arrays.toString(arr));
		for(int i=0;i<n-1;i++)
		{
			for(int j=i+1;j<n;j++)
			{
				if(arr[j]>arr[i])
				{
					sum=sum+arr[j];
					break;
				}
			}
		}
		System.out.println(sum);*/

		String str=s.nextLine();
		System.out.print("enter key value ");
		int key=s.nextInt();
		
		for(int i=0;i<str.length();i++)
		{
			char ch=str.charAt(i);
			if(ch>=97 && ch<=122)
			{
				ch-=key;
				if(ch<97)
				{
					ch+=26;
				}
			}
			System.out.print(ch);
		}
		
		

	}

}


output:

bvec
enter key value 4
xray

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

package sample01;
import java.util.*;

public class String02 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Scanner s=new Scanner(System.in);
		/*int n=s.nextInt();
		int sum=0;
		int arr[]=new int[n];
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			arr[i]=s.nextInt();
		}
		System.out.println(Arrays.toString(arr));
		for(int i=0;i<n-1;i++)
		{
			for(int j=i+1;j<n;j++)
			{
				if(arr[j]>arr[i])
				{
					sum=sum+arr[j];
					break;
				}
			}
		}
		System.out.println(sum);*/

		String str=s.nextLine();
		System.out.print("enter key value ");
		int key=s.nextInt();
		key=key%26;
		
		for(int i=0;i<str.length();i++)
		{
			char ch=str.charAt(i);
			if(ch>=97 && ch<=122)
			{
				ch-=key;
				if(ch<97)
				{
					
					System.out.print((char)(ch+26));
				}
				else
				{
					System.out.print((char)(ch));
				}
			}
			
		}
		
		

	}

}


output:

bvec
enter key value 400
rlus
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
